Diana: "Bob is lying! I am the real detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafia. Don't be fooled by Bob's false claim."

Charlie: "This is getting confusing. Bob says Diana is mafia, but Diana says she's the detective and I'm mafia. If Diana is the detective, she wouldn't lie about investigating me. If Bob is the detective, he wouldn't lie about Diana...."
Diana: "Bob is clearly lying to save himself. I investigated Charlie and he is innocent, so Bob must be the mafia trying to frame me. Vote Bob!"
You: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and she is mafia. Vote Diana to win."

Diana was arrested
